beats.description: delay time in beats (according to current bpm)

LPF.description: Low Pass Filter (LPF). Only passes through frequencies below the cutoff.

HPF.description: High Pass Filter (HPF). Only passes through frequencies above the cutoff.

drop.description: Bass drop: when triggered apply a HPF with the cutoff running from high to low

t_trig.description: Set to one to trigger the filter, usually do this with an fxcontrol:t_trig message

attack.description: Attach time of HPF envelope in seconds

beats.description: Number of beats the HPF envelope should last for

BPF.description: Band Pass Filter (BPF). Only passes through frequencies close to the note.

rq.description: Width of band, reciprocal of Q where Q is cutoff/bandwidth

flanger.description: In a Flanger, a delayed signal is added to the original signal with a continuously-variable delay (usually smaller than 10 ms) creating a phasing effect.
